title: Devfix.com Sites Apple Updates Setbacks that may Irk Most of Its Users
text:
Apple products are guaranteed for its quality and durability, but perfection is hard to achieve and some problems may just occur in any device and product a person is using. The transformation that the iOS7 provided last 2014 may not be as striking and conspicuous of this year’s Apple’s newest flavor. The Apple’s mobile platform offers plenty of new features that can be enjoyed by its users such as new apps and little tweaks in the program of the device. The ability of the new Apple product to add custom keyboards, new iCloud Drive, and iMessage feature galore and new camera feature is something that is to excite many people.
Unfortunately, problems always find its way even to the most awesome device there is in the market. Just like any other updates, many are now starting to regret upgrading their iPad from iOS7 to iOS8 as problems are starting to rear its ugly head in the support forum. IPad repair is now making its way to the market as many Apple users are experiencing some of these problems;
• Freezing during updates – one of the first setbacks an Apple user will face is the sudden and seemingly not moving update. The device that appears to have been freeze during the update and looking like the update will never be complete.
• Handoff or Continuity Calls not working – many people are struggling when it comes to using the Continuity feature of the Apple devices as it seems to not work quite properly. Assuming that the device has met the system requirements and still in the midst of struggling, there are little things one can try. The first thing to check is if the is connected in the same Wi-Fi network and the Bluetooth and Wi-Fi are turned on.
• Calendar showing GMT – most people encountered issues like new events in the calendar shows to be in GMT default instead of local time zone. In order for this to be fixed, the iPad user must delete the said application, restart the device and download it again. This method worked for some people.
• Unable to move email to trash – a lot of people are experiencing an issue where email messages remain unmoved and are not able to be transferred to the trash. This kind of issue has been given another form as iOS8.1 update completely disables messages to be moved to the trash.
• Problem with apps download and update – most people encountered trouble in updating apps or getting a new one. It seems like updating an app will cause for the app to hang, and most people find it hard to get new apps or just to be able to download it.
These are just some of the problems that can be encountered in Apple devices, some may quite fixable, but there are some that can pose an annoyance to its users.
